roadMap.roadGoal: Goal: Identify a problem worth solving and validate your solution.
keyActions: Brainstorm ideas based on market needs, passions, and expertise.
Validate the idea with potential customers (surveys, interviews).
recommendedCourses: Entrepreneurship in Emerging Economies (HarvardX on edX)
Business Model Canvas: A Tool for Entrepreneurs (Coursera)

roadMap.roadGoal: Assemble a complementary team to bring your vision to life.
keyActions: Identify skill gaps (technical, marketing, sales, finance)
Recruit co-founders and key team members
Build a culture of trust and accountability
recommendedCourses: Foundations of Leadership (Harvard Business School Online)

roadMap.roadGoal: Create a robust business model and strategy.
keyActions: Write a Business Plan (including financial forecasts)
Identify revenue streams and cost structure
recommendedCourses: How to Write a Business Plan (Udemy)

keyActions: Build a prototype or beta version
recommendedCourses: Agile Development & Scrum Master Training (LinkedIn Learning)
Product Design: The Process of Creating and Refining (Coursera)

roadMap.roadGoal: Attract customers and drive sales growth.
keyActions: Build a strong online presence (social media, website, SEO)
Develop a marketing strategy (including social media)
Create a sales process and pipeline
recommendedCourses: Sales Training: Techniques for a Human-Centric Approach (Udemy)
SEO and Social Media Marketing (LinkedIn Learning)

roadMap.roadGoal: Establish a solid foundation for your business.
keyActions: Set up a business entity (e.g., sole proprietorship, LLC)
Establish a financial system (e.g., accounting, invoicing)
Create a supply chain and logistics plan
recommendedCourses: Customer Service: The Art of Delivering Exceptional Customer Experiences (Udemy)
